__e: If things are so bad, why don't you use it?
I told you that in confidence, not so you could use it against me.
Hey, listen, why don't you use your money to skip the line, get a new heart?
"I bid you use the power, you have upon her."
He's using people's fear for his own gain.
You exploit the poor people, who have nothing to eat.
You take advantage because Charlie and Alan are not here to help us.
If she turns around, it means she likes me.
He's just... Taking advantage of you both being good people.
How would he use them, if not to cry out?
But he won't kill, so what good is he to you?
And he will not let Eddie off the hook, I'm telling you!
You know what they are and you stick to them.
